titles.title: アンジェリーク　Twinコレクション

data.title: Angelique: Twin Collection
data.title_japanese: アンジェリーク　Twinコレクション
data.synopsis:
As the title implies, this series features a pair of characters per episode. Each DVD has one music video for each character, plus one part of an eight part story. Annoyingly, the music videos are for the short versions of the songs, not the full versions... to get those, you had to buy the Twin Collection CDs.

(Source: Neo-Romance)

openings: 1: "Gold Rush ~21st Century's~" by Olivie (cv. Takehito Koyasu) (eps 1)
2: "Kimi no Tame ni Koko ni Iru" by Randy (cv. Nobutoshi Canna) (eps 2)
4: "Taiyou e no Kaidan" by Julious (cv. Sho Hayami) (eps 4)
5: "Sen-nen no Yakusoku" by Clavis (cv. Hideyuki Tanaka) (eps 5)
6: "Kiss shite ii?" by Mel (cv. Yumi Touma) (eps 6)
7: "Illusion ~Mabaroshi no Chou~" by SeiLan (cv. Tetsuya Iwanaga) (eps 7)
8: "Together ~Michi Naki Michi o Susume~" by Victor (cv. Fumihiko Tachiki) (eps 8)
endings: 2: "Hoshi no Yubiwa - Shining Star -" by Timka (cv. Atsushi Kisaichi) (eps 2)
5: "Stay ~Asu Naki Sekai de" by Arios (cv. Ken Narita) (eps 5)
6: "Shijou ni Te" by Luva (cv. Toshihiko Seki) (eps 6)
7: "Kokoro ni Kakeru Niji" by Marcel (cv. Hiro Yuuki) (eps 7)
8: "Shiawase no Tapestry" by Lumiale (cv. Nobuo Tobita) (eps 8)
